content: Greetings all, To accelerate interoperability via new exchange protocols such as FHIR, and via new exchange use cases such as value-based care, in the coming weeks, eHealth Exchange plans to award up to three $100,000 innovation grants plus waive awardeesâ€™ network participation fees for up to two years. Grant terms, conditions, and deadlines are detailed at https://ehealthexchange.org/innovation-grant-program. Could you please share this with your community if appropriate if you believe they may potentially benefit?
